content: {"locationId": "8757", "organizationId": "7201", "name": "Christian Helping Hands", "address1": "608 Oak Main St", "address2": "", "city": "Comanche", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "73529", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "34.3686686", "longitude": "-97.9684528", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Hot/Cold Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Jefferson County, Stephens County", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Our mission is to share the love of Jesus as we give food, clothing, housing and hope to the hungry, homeless and hurting.  Our pantry is client choice allowing families to shop and choose what food they receive according to their family size and need.  They will receive enough food for a week or more and can shop monthly if needed.  In addition to a food pantry, we have a clothing closet that is open weekly and a housing program for women coming out of difficult life situations who need a second chance.  We recently opened The Hope Center to combine effective programs and passionate people who can connect, support and uplift families facing poverty, family challenges, and limited services.  Our vision is to see children and families living their best life in a support community.   ", "notes": "", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "580-439-5712", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Home Delivery Options, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 64, "regionName": "Regional Food Bank of Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "b268ff1b-39fa-45f4-a37e-421975c3f339.png", "website": "https://www.regionalfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Friday 10:00 AM-4:00 PM", "Friday 10:00 AM-4:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
